source.en: Blaser, Magdalena "Myths of the Cofán people"

sentences.text: Fae tsandie pushepa tise pushei'ccu can'jen.

values.value: There once lived a man and his wife.

sentences.text: Tsa tsandie'ja yajema cui'ye atesu'cho.
Tsa a'ija fae a'ta yajema cu'ipa ccusipa yaje cui'jeni'su tsa'oye settapa ja'je.
Tsa'caen settapa ja'je tise pusheni japa fae'ngae ccuipa ccusi'jeyi tisu pushema du'sian.
Tsa'caen tsonsi surie dapa coeñamba tsandie du'shuve isu.
Tsa du'shuja ccoanifae canqquefave an'biamba coenza'cantsse setta'poen co'feye atesu.
Tsa du'shuja cca'i dushundeqquia'caen tsamppini ja'jembi.
Tsa'cansi tise ton'tonjan tise'ma afase co'fepa fe'ña tsincon.
Tsa'caen tsincon'su fae a'ta tsampini ja.
Tise tsa'caen tssampini jasi tsai'mbitssia munda tise'ma shonque'ndi'tsse ttu'fa.
Tsa'caen ttuyepa quini'si'ye ansunde sefani.
Tsa'ma tsa'caen ansunde'ni'qque quini'sima tse'tse osaemba tsa afase'suma an'fa.
Tsa'caen munda ansi jimbi'si japa atte'fa munda an'choma.
Attepa jipa in'jan'fa tsa a'i panshen du'shuma afasepa fe'ñañe atesu'choma.
Tsomba in'jan tsa du'shuta tsu munda na'su.
Tsa'camba tsu tise'ma afase'chone fi'ttipa an'fa.
Tsa'caen in'jamba tsa coenzaja tise antiama an'chone pa'cco mundama fittittiye in'jan.
Tsa'caen in'jamba tise dutssiyendeccuma ttu'sepa condase ma'caen tsomba tsa munda sheque'choma fittittiye.
Tsomba su yajema cu'ipa mundave di'shapa pa'cco mundama catsiañe.
Tsa'ma condapa su: Fae munda tise sepacconi sanccopaje cuvateva'pama an'bian'choma fi'ttimbe can'faye.
Tsa'caen condasepa puiyi'cco paña'fasi yajema otaemba injan'tsse cu'i.
Cu'ipa ccusipa mundave di'sha.
Tsa'caen di'shapa pa'cho mundama i, cuintsu fitti'tti'faye.
Munda tsaofanga jijisi puiyi'ccoma fitti'tti sefaen'fa.
Tsonsi tsa rande mundayi ccusha tsa a'i mundave di'sha'choyi.
